data.求人内容:
[機関の説明(募集の背景、機関の詳細、プロジェクトの説明等)]
The Okinawa Institute of Science and Technology Graduate University (OIST) is a model for change in education and research with the best international graduate students, working side by side with world-class faculty in modern well-equipped laboratories. The Prototype Machinist will provide machining and mechanical design support for the fabrication of components to be used in a variety of scientific experiments at the university. The Engineering Support Section has a team environment, having interactions with　researchers of many nationalities. Parts will range in size from miniature to large, and will be produced from both common and exotic materials. The primary role will also include production of parts using both conventional and CNC lathes and milling machines, EDMs, and additive manufacturing. The Prototype Machinist will work with researchers to design parts and assemblies that will be used in experiments.


[仕事内容(業務内容、担当科目等)]
1. Manufacture precision parts and assemblies using a variety of conventional and CNC machine tools
2. Design and analysis of mechanical parts and assemblies
3. Inspection of completed parts
4. Create manufacturing drawings for the production of parts


[勤務地住所等]
Onna-son, Okinawa, Japan

[募集人員]
1名

[着任時期]
As early as possible

Ability to read and interpret blueprints, sketches, and specifications5. CAD/CAM experience, preferably with SolidWorks, and MasterCam or CamWorks6. The candidate must be able to carry out all daily business in English(Preferred)1. Ability to communicate in both English and Japanese2. 5 years of relevant experience is preferred
